lesson.title_and_level: Advanced - 八卦周刊：巩俐疑似怀孕

word.literal: deadline for submitting article for publication
to forget even sleeping and eating
a life over which death is preferable
how could I be so lucky?
to make a turn for the better
to put on a show of prudery
the bold die of gluttony, while the meek starve

character.pinyin: chēngsǐ dǎndà de, èsǐ dǎnxiǎo de
character.simplified: 撑死胆大的，饿死胆小的
character.traditional: 撐死膽大的，餓死膽小的
